name: Ibda Innovate Build Deliver FZ-LLC
profile_description: Ibda is an R&D-driven company that transforms ideas into tangible realities, from concept to proof-of-concept and beyond.

name: iinfinitty Media and Technologies FZ-LLC
profile_description: At iinfinitty we are developing kids animated entertainment series focused on skills based learning and real-life problem-solving abilities written by some prominent story writers from Hollywood under the supervision of award-winning animation and VFX content production industry veterans. Our contents are equipped with new media technologies which help kids to get familiar with technologies and learn how to be prepared for the future by being smart. Our Parental control & kids online security AI powered solution is designed to solve parents much needed problems of their kids online & on-screen time problems with a peace of mind that their kids are 360 degrees safe online.
